scripts.prettier:fix: git ls-tree -r `git branch --show-current` --name-only | grep -E "\.[tj]?sx?$|\.yaml$|\.json$" | grep -v assets | grep -v lerna.json | xargs -P 1 prettier --write
scripts.prettier:check: git ls-tree -r `git branch --show-current` --name-only | grep -E "\.[tj]?sx?$|\.yaml$|\.json$" | grep -v assets | grep -v lerna.json | xargs -P 1 -I "{}" sh -c 'test -f {} && prettier --check {} || true' > /dev/null
